problems.title: Right-Angled Triangle Pattern
problems.description:
Write a program to print a right-angled triangle pattern of stars of height n.

Input Format:
A single integer n.

Output Format:
Print the pattern as shown in the examples.
problems.examples:
Sample Input
5

Sample Output
*
**
***
****
*****

Explanation:
A triangle of height 5 is printed.
hintsList: Outer loop for rows, inner loop for columns.
